DOC.brief_summary: The total knee replacement become routine procedure . Survival rate 90 % 10 year generally report . However , complication reoperation may still occur many reason , may relate component design : loosening ( tibial ) , polyethylene wear , knee stiffness , ligamentous instability , etc ... . Therefore , new design , least theory , improve result conventional model . In study , investigator want compare retrospectively data concerning survival rate patient wear total knee prosthesis mobile plate 10 year , one publish literature conventional fixed-bearing prosthesis .
DOC.brief_title: Survival Rates Patients With Mobile Bearing Total Knee Arthroplasty After 10 Years
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 year Patients wear total knee prosthesis mobile plate 10 year Patients 18 year
